wikitext.*:
{{引自其他wiki|中文維基}}
这个模块及其相关的下级模块支持[[enwiki:Help:Citation Style 1|Citation Style 1]]以及[[enwiki:Help:Citation Style 2|Citation Style 2]]格式的引文模板。这两者通常简称为CS1和CS2。

{| class="wikitable" style="margin: 1em auto 1em auto;"
|+cs1 {{w}} cs2 模块
|-
!在用的!!colspan="2"|沙盒!!简介
|-
| [[Module:Citation/CS1]] || [[Module:Citation/CS1/sandbox]] || {{Plain link|url=https://zh.moegirl.org/index.php?title=模块:Citation/CS1/sandbox&action=edit|name=[{{int:Edit}}<nowiki>]</nowiki>}} || Rendering and support functions
|-
| [[Module:Citation/CS1/Configuration]] || [[Module:Citation/CS1/Configuration/sandbox]] || {{Plain link|url=https://zh.moegirl.org/index.php?title=模块:Citation/CS1/Configuration/sandbox&action=edit|name=[{{int:Edit}}<nowiki>]</nowiki>}} || Translation tables; error and identifier handlers
|-
| [[Module:Citation/CS1/Whitelist]] || [[Module:Citation/CS1/Whitelist/sandbox]] || {{Plain link|url=https://zh.moegirl.org/index.php?title=模块:Citation/CS1/Whitelist/sandbox&action=edit|name=[{{int:Edit}}<nowiki>]</nowiki>}} || List of active, deprecated, and obsolete cs1{{w}}2 parameters
|-
| [[Module:Citation/CS1/Date validation]] || [[Module:Citation/CS1/Date validation/sandbox]] || {{Plain link|url=https://zh.moegirl.org/index.php?title=模块:Citation/CS1/Date_validation/sandbox&action=edit|name=[{{int:Edit}}<nowiki>]</nowiki>}} || Date format validation functions
|-
| [[Module:Citation/CS1/Identifiers]] || [[Module:Citation/CS1/Identifiers/sandbox]] || {{Plain link|url=https://zh.moegirl.org/index.php?title=模块:Citation/CS1/Identifiers/sandbox&action=edit|name=[{{int:Edit}}<nowiki>]</nowiki>}}  || Functions that support the named identifiers (isbn, doi, pmid, etc)
|-
| [[Module:Citation/CS1/Utilities]] || [[Module:Citation/CS1/Utilities/sandbox]] || {{Plain link|url=https://zh.moegirl.org/index.php?title=模块:Citation/CS1/Utilities/sandbox&action=edit|name=[{{int:Edit}}<nowiki>]</nowiki>}} || Common functions and tables
|-
| [[Module:Citation/CS1/COinS]] || [[Module:Citation/CS1/COinS/sandbox]] || {{Plain link|url=https://zh.moegirl.org/index.php?title=模块:Citation/CS1/COinS/sandbox&action=edit|name=[{{int:Edit}}<nowiki>]</nowiki>}} || Functions that render a cs1{{w}}2 template's metadata
